welcomePage.intro: Another Serverless Example (ASE) is an open source project to share to the community the knowledge of how create a serverless app on AWS. ASE uses a myriad of AWS services such as Lambda, DynamoDB, Cognito, API Gateway, Cloudfront and so on... ASE doesn't do much, after creating an account you can create some post-it on a private board and save them. You can obviously easily delete your account and all data attached to it in the security settings.
welcomePage.github: The source code of the application is available on Github:
